**ITQ: Phase 1 - EV385-250200_B - Mechanical Work Package B for Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS)**
==========================================================

### Tender Details
------------

*   **Tender Reference**: WS4601250839
*   **Publication Date**: July 5, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: August 2, 2024, 14:00 EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 15, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2027

### Notice Description
------------------

This tender solicitation cancels and supersedes previous tender number WS4601250839, dated May 31, 2024, with a closing date of June 26, 2024. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted a bid on the previous solicitation.

### Tender Requirements
------------------

Work included in this contract comprises renovations of the mechanical systems at the Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS). The work scope includes, but is not limited to, the following:

*   Adding an effluent treatment system to serve the existing Necropsy Laboratory in the Main Research Building (MRB).
*   Replacing trench drain grates and replacing drainage piping serving the Wet Lab of the Laboratory in the Main Research Building (MRB).
*   Adding a pump out system and drainage to serve the existing Laydown tank within the Main Research Building (MRB).

### Evaluation Criteria
-------------------

*   Qualifications of all interested suppliers will be evaluated during the first phase.
*   Suppliers who are deemed qualified will be invited to provide a financial bid on the project during the second phase.

### Contact Information
---------------------

*   **Contact Person**: Vinay Singh (SPAC/PSPC)

### Procurement Details

*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: None specified
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entities**: Same as Contracting Entity
